title: He used to pray then stopped praying for 3 months, is he a kafir? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: aan from India alikum Salam so my question is if a person was not praying for 3 months but he used to pray before that and he started praying again so my question is is he a c because he didn't pray for 3 months and who caresan um who cares as as long as he's praying now alhamdulillah he's a musliman yes who cares I mean um my friend has a question okay tell him she says who cares as long as you pray now ask Allah for forgiveness repent show remorse and never do this again
